description: Manage smart locks and access codes across your Seam-connected devices. Check lock status, lock or unlock doors, and create, update, or delete time-bound access codes for one or many locks. Streamline property operations and guest access with bulk code management.

seamApiKey.description: Your Seam API key from https://console.seam.co/

capabilities.name: list_locks
capabilities.description: List all smart locks connected to your Seam account

capabilities.name: get_status
capabilities.description: Get a comprehensive status overview of all locks including battery levels, lock states, and any issues

capabilities.name: get_lock
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific lock

capabilities.name: get_lock_status
capabilities.description: Get the current lock status (locked/unlocked) of a specific lock

capabilities.name: create_access_code
capabilities.description: Create an access code on a specific lock with optional time limits

capabilities.name: create_access_code_on_multiple_locks
capabilities.description: Create the same access code on multiple locks (useful for creating one code for all locks in a location)

capabilities.name: list_access_codes
capabilities.description: List all access codes, optionally filtered by device

capabilities.name: delete_access_code
capabilities.description: Delete an access code from a lock

capabilities.name: update_access_code
capabilities.description: Update an existing access code (change name, code, or time limits)
